efxpt:issue.message: These HSIO GPIO must be placed at least 1 pair away from LVDS hdmi_rx_d0 in order to avoid noise coupling from GPIO to LVDS: GPIOR_N_15,GPIOR_P_15
These HSIO GPIO must be placed at least 1 pair away from LVDS tmds_tx_clk in order to avoid noise coupling from GPIO to LVDS: GPIOR_P_09
These HSIO GPIO must be placed at least 1 pair away from LVDS tmds_tx_data0 in order to avoid noise coupling from GPIO to LVDS: GPIOR_N_14,GPIOR_P_14
